com.pokerface.pokerapi.game

Class GameStateTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokerface.pokerapi.game.GameStateTransport

  • public class GameStateTransport
extends java.lang.Object
    GameStateTransport is the object that is communicated by the GameController to the Front End user, it represents the GameState as they see it, with only public information. It also has an Event object which confers why the GameState is being sent.

    The GameStateTransport is submitted upon every action that is sent and processed, whenever a hand is started or finished and whenever a player leaves or enters.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  GameStateTransport.Event
      A class that contains an action, why the event is being sent, and an optional message for extra communication if necessary
      private class  GameStateTransport.PlayerTransport
      A Player representation, containing an id, their seat, the money they have, the action they last performed, if they are a player or if they are a dealer.
      static class  GameStateTransport.Reason
      GameStateTransport.Reason are all of the reasons that the GameStateTransport can be sent for.

      • GameStateTransport

        public GameStateTransport()

      • GameStateTransport

        public GameStateTransport(Card communityCardOne,
                          Card communityCardTwo,
                          Card communityCardThree,
                          Card communityCardFour,
                          Card communityCardFive,
                          int potSum,
                          int bigBlind,
                          GameStateTransport.Reason action,
                          java.lang.String event,
                          java.util.List<Player> players,
                          java.util.List<GameAction> gameActions,
                          int nextPlayer)
        This creates a GameStateTransport for full use.
        Parameters:
        communityCardOne - Each of community cards are identical, representing a card in the community
        communityCardTwo - card two
        communityCardThree - card three
        communityCardFour - card four, in round 2
        communityCardFive - card five, in round 3
        potSum - the sum of the pot
        bigBlind - the amount the bigBlind currently is
        action - the reason the action is being sent
        event - the occurence that made the object be sent
        players - the players in the game, a class for transport
        gameActions - the actions performed
        nextPlayer - whose turn it is now
